price: 40 Rends-moi, Seigneur, assidu à la prière, ainsi qu’une partie de ma descendance. Veuille, Seigneur, exaucer mon invocation.
arabic: رَبِّ ٱجۡعَلۡنِي مُقِيمَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتِيۚ رَبَّنَا وَتَقَبَّلۡ دُعَآءِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: rabbi ij'ʿalnī muqīma al-ṣalati wamin dhurriyyatī rabbanā wataqabbal duʿāi
